runs.comm: nipped back in sharply, and some good bounce too, short of a good length outside off, tries to cut but the ball jags back in to hit him on the thighs
short of a length on middle and leg, tucked away wide of fine leg off the back foot for a couple
short of a good length on middle, defended off the back foot short of square leg
wide, bouncer banged in short outside leg, given a wide, South Africa will welcome that
good length on the off stump, drops it short of point and races for a quick single, easily done
does well, back of a length on the leg stump, works it away fine, just wide of fine leg, for a couple
almost dragged it on, full outside off, goes for a blazing drive through the covers, gets a thick inside edge towards fine leg
bouncer banged in on middle, tries to hook that down behind square, gets the top-edge over the keeper's head for a boundary
pulled away, long hop on middle, dismisses it over square leg for a boundary
short of a good length outside off, checks his shot, dabs it uppishly towards mid-off for a single
bouncer outside leg stump, erring in line here, given a wide
good length on middle and leg, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
Harwood's being punished, bowled on a good length outside off, Gibbs charges down the track and smashes it over the extra-cover boundary
good comeback, bowled on a good length on middle, Gibbs, rather respectfully, defends it back to the bowler
full on middle and off, pushed down the ground to mid-on, came in a touch
short on middle, tried to pull it away behind square, was hit on the gloves and the ball rolls towards square leg, they take a single
short of a good length on middle, turned away to square leg off the back foot
struck that well but straight to cover, low full toss on the off stump, makes room and creams it, but straight to the fielder
slower ball bowled short outside off, Gibbs plays the right shot, but is into it too early, also, he fails to pick the pace there, misses

almost a run out, dabbed into the off side short of cover, Clarke charges in and rockets in a throw towards the  non-striker's end, misses, Gibbs was short had that hit, was struggling to complete the single there

wicket off the first ball in his maiden Twenty20 international! Loosener outside off stump, bowled at 117.3 kmph, Gibbs gets forward and drives it uppishly to Ponting, who makes no mistake at cover. A gift, that.
oversteps, tucked into the leg side for a single, concedes a freehit
slashes and misses, short and wide, should have been dismissed to the point boundary, wasted opportunity
just over the short square-leg fielder, short of a good length on middle, turned away uppishly just wide of the catcher on the leg side, gets a couple
back of a length outside off, pushed wide of mid-of for a quick single
straying on the pads, flicked away fine but some good fielding in the deep by Warner keeps them to a single
full and wide, Amla seizes the chance, creams that through the covers for a pressure-relieving boundary
short of a good length, bowled at 142.3 kmph outside off, chopped down to cover, mistimed cut there
short again and pays the price this time, change of tactic from de Villiers who drags it wide of mid-on this time, works for him, gets a boundary
beaten this time, well done Harwood, good length outside off, spat off the pitch, moved away just as de Villiers got back to defend, beat the outside edge there
full and wide, mistimes a drive wide of cover where Clarke dives to keep them to a single
driving length outside off and Amla goes for it, moves away after pitching, the batsman misses, and the bowler is awarded with a wide called by the umpire, a little too harsh there
that's cost him, short outside off, Amla plays an identical shot attempted by de Villiers earlier in the over, pulls it away wide of mid-on
full on middle, driven back firmly to the bowler, a sound start by South Africa here, Amla's looking solid

Jeeves is having a ball here! Bowled on a good length on the off stump, keeps just a little low and zips through his defenses, tried to play that off the back foot but was nowhere near it, silence around the Wanderers
full on middle and off, pushed to cover off the front foot
short of a good length on the off stump, dabbed to point off the back foot
good length on the off stump, bowled at 121.1 kmph, defended cautiously towards cover
fullish outside off, tries to drive it through the line towards mid-off, hits the inside half of the bat and rolls back to the bowler
good length on middle and leg, worked away gently between mid-on and midwicket for a single
tossed up on middle, pushed back to the bowler
good length on the off stump, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
round the wicket to the left-hander, quicker and full on the off stump, eased wide of cover, 50 up for the hosts
tossed up on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
flighted on middle and off, punched down the ground to long-off
full on the off stump, bunts it down to long-off for another run
beats him rightaway, good length outside off, moves away prodigiously after pitching, Amla, who's moves across to defend it on the off side, misses
short and wide, goes for the cut, misses, should have connected there
good length on the off stump, driven on the up off the front foot wide of deep cover for a couple
short of a length on leg stump, tries to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, gets a tickle off the glove on the bounce to the keeper, missed out there
pushed off the back foot wide of Ponting at cover, he throws at the striker's end but Duminy, thanks to an awkward slide, is in safely
fullish on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
quick and full on middle and leg, tries to drill it down the ground, gets a thin inside edge onto his pads
shorter on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
long hop, on middle, pulled away wide of deep midwicket for a couple
driven off the front foot towards Clarke at cover who fumbles to allow them a single
excellent shot, flighted and full outside off, makes room and drives it through the line wide of extra cover for a boundary, sheer class there, found the gap to perfection

bowled 'im! Full and straight on the off stump, Amla is a little late into that shot, tries to flick it away in front of square, misses and the off stump is pegged back. Big blow, he was looking dangerous there, and it's that man Hussey again who's done the damage
short of a good length outside off, runs it down to third man off the back foot
full on the off stump, pushed off the front foot with a straight bat to mid-off
back of a length on the off stump, opens the face to guide it to third man
slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, took van Jaarsveld by surprise there, zipped off the pitch to bat the outside edge
short on leg stump, tucked away behind square for a single
goes for it, just a fraction short on middle, comes down the track and pulls it away towards deep square leg, mistimes it but gets a single for his efforts
full on the off stump, defended off the front foot back to the bowler
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
yorker length on middle, dug out back to the bowler

appeal for un out, full on the off stump, pushed back firmly to the bowler, Duminy has backed up a little too much there, Hussey picks it up and flicks it back onto the stumps at the non-striker's end, the batsman is in a spot of bother thee, replays suggest that the bail was not completely dislodged at the time he was short of his ground, he was back in in the next frame
full toss on the off stump, driven to long-on for a single
timely boundary, short of a length outside off, makes room coming forward and cuts it away over point
the buzz is back, full outside leg stump, tickles it to the fine-leg boundary, poor ball but he gave it the right treatment
slower ball outside leg stump, cut back in to miss the leg stump but it's still down the leg side, given a wide

big wicket! Just when it seemed Duminy was helping his team claw back, Hopes has uprooted his off stump. Short of a length and Duminy is tempted to go for a cross-batted pull over midwicket, the ball keeps a little low, he misses and the sticks behind him take a beating.
good length on middle, pushes him back, he defends it to midwicket
in the channel on the off stump, defends with a full face back to the bowler
goes for it, full outside off, tries to loft it over mid-off, just about manages it, hits the toe-end of the bat, lucky escape there, gets a single on top of that
South Africa are now in a crisis! Yorker bowled quick on the off stump, van Jaarsveld takes a couple of steps forward and tries to dig it out on the off side, misses and is bowled through the gate.
flighted on the off stump, driven to long-off, he's a capable hitter Morkel, can he pull off something special here?
flighted on middle, comes down the track and pushes that to long-on
flat and short on leg stump, turned away wide of midwicket, well it hits his thighs
full on middle, pushed off the front foot to cover
first bowling lapse for Hussey, full toss on middle, Boucher pulls it away through the square-leg region for a boundary
starts with a wide down the leg side, Australia can afford one every now and then with the position they are in
full on the leg side, drives it wristily towards deep midwicket
good length on leg stump, shuffles and tickles it to fine leg
wide again, fullish outside off but a little too wide, Morkel withdraws from a drive and wins a wide for his efforts
not this time, much closer to the off stump, makes room to steer it past point, misses
short of a good length outside off, pushed to point off the back foot
short and wide, slashed away to third man, the task is getting difficult by the ball for the hosts now
bouncer banged in short on middle, called a wide, rightly so, it's too high
short on leg stump, pulled away towards fine leg for a single
starts with a juicy full toss on the off stump, Boucher mistimes it to midwicket, missed out there
short of a length on the off stump, goes for the pull again, gets an inside edge onto his pads and they get a single on the off side
a much-needed boundary, full toss outside off, slices it away over point, brings up the 100 for South Africa
full on the leg stump, should have glanced it down fine but misses, is struck on the pads and they get a leg bye
full outside off, steered towards Clarke at point who misfields to allow them a single
run out chance, full on the off stump, drilled to mid-off where the fielder attempts a direct hit at the non-striker's end and misses by a whisker, Morkel was a dead duck had that hit
full on leg stump and he picks it beautifully, stands his ground and dismisses it over the deep square-leg boundary
Full on middle and leg, stays his ground and smashes that fiercely back past the bowler for a boundary, could this be the over that changes this game?
good length on the off stump, driven towards deep cover where a fumble allows them enough time to get back for the second
low full toss on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
sensible batting, fullish on middle and leg, pushed through the line to long-on for a single
in the slot but fails to cash in, goes really hard at it, tries to slog it over midwicket but mistimes it to long-on instead
sweetly struck, low full toss on leg stump, he picks it up superbly, drives it over the bowlers head for a boundary wide of long-on
Morkerl's gone berserk! Meaty length ball on the off stump, he's gets stuck into it, dispatches it miles into the crowd between deep midwicket and long-on, poor Hopes
he's getting pulverized here, full and wide, Morkel makes room and steers it delightfully past point, third man had given up
length ball again but all he can manage this time is a single to long-off, Boucher on strike now, Hopes will be relieved
horrendous bowling by Hopes here, full toss on the off stump, Boucher has no trouble pulling it away between long-on and deep midwicket, another crucial boundary
low full toss on the off stump, steered behind point for a couple towards a diving third man

Johnson has delivered the breakthrough! Slower ball bowled full on the off stump, Morkel is tempted to dismiss that into the stands once again, fails to connect well this time, lofts it really high and David Hussey takes a well-judged catch running in from long-off
short of a length outside off, chopped down to point
an inswinging yorker, on middle and leg, dug out into the off side for a single
wide down the leg side, only just though, short of a length on the leg stump and moved down, Botha let it go
short of a length outside off, cut away towards deep cover, firmly struck but straight to the fielder
good length on leg stump, turned away off the back foot towards fine leg, decide wisely against the second
full on leg stump, swung in to strike him on the pads, they get a leg bye towards third man, would have gone down
shot! Full outside off, Botha gets forward and drives that crisply through the narrow gap between extra cover and mid-off, beautifully timed
goodish length on middle and leg, driven through the line to long-on

dropped, on middle and leg, goes for a mighty heave over square leg, gets the top edge and takes ages to come down, Geeves going back from short fine drops it but it;s a difficult chance, almost deflects it to the boundary but some alert fielding by David Hussey saves a run
full outside off, gets outside the line to paddle it fine, misses, is struck on the pads and they get a run
Harwood's had a torrid time, short on the off stump, there to hit, Boucher pulls it away between long-on and deep midwicket, smashed to the boundary
manages to finish a disappointing spell with a yorker on leg stump, dug out wide of midwicket for a single
starts with a horrific full toss on the off stump, it's bread and butter for Boucher who smacks it between deep square leg and deep midwicket for a decisive four

and it's all over! Australia have thrown it away towards the end, full on the off stump and Boucher slogs it over midwicket for a boundary, the crowd goes wild, and the South Africans - on the field and in the dug out - are ecstatic.
